name: everything-llm
description: The best solution for turning private documents into a chat bot using off-the-shelf tools and commercially viable AI technologies.

scripts.lint: cd server && yarn lint && cd .. && cd frontend && yarn lint
scripts.setup: cd server && npm i && cd ../frontend && npm i && cd .. && npm i setup:envs && npm i prisma:setup && echo "Please run npm run dev:server and npm run dev:frontend in separate terminal tabs."
scripts.setup:envs:
cp -n ./frontend/.env.example ./frontend/.env && cp -n ./server/.env.example ./server/.env.development && cp -n ./collector/.env.example ./collector/.env && cp -n ./docker/.env.example ./docker/.env && echo "All ENV files copied!
"
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.prisma:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:setup: yarn prisma:generate && yarn prisma:migrate && yarn prisma:seed
